summary: Comprehensive AI Quiz Platform web application with 15+ pages. Features include AI quiz generation, gamification (XP, leaderboards, achievements), student/teacher dashboards, analytics, quiz library, manual quiz creator, question bank, pricing page, and user profiles. Built with React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Router, Recharts, and Lucide React. Modern SaaS + gamified UI blending Kahoot energy with Notion's clean design.
architectural_notes: Tech stack: React 18 + TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Router, Recharts, Lucide React
Design system: Purple/Violet gradient primary (#7C3AED to #4F46E5), Cyan/Teal accent, dark sidebar navigation, rounded-xl cards
Navigation: Persistent sidebar for authenticated pages, role-based views (student vs teacher), top navbar with avatar/notifications/XP
All pages use consistent mock data: 10+ sample quizzes, 10 leaderboard users, sample achievements, sample analytics
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract AI brain/neural network illustration for hero section, vibrant purple and cyan tones on dark background (hero-brain.dim_1200x600.png)
- Cartoon-style trophy and medal illustration for leaderboard podium, gold silver bronze metallic finish (leaderboard-trophy.dim_400x400.png)
- Geometric achievement badge collection icons, 12 distinct badge shapes in purple cyan and gold (achievement-badges.dim_800x400.png)
- Abstract flowing gradient background texture, deep purple to indigo with subtle cyan light rays (gradient-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Landing Page (/) with: animated gradient hero section with 'AI Quiz Generator' headline, sub-headline, and CTA buttons (Start Quiz, Generate Quiz); features section with AI generation, adaptive difficulty, and analytics cards; 3-step 'How It Works' section with icons; interactive demo quiz preview with a sample question; stats section showing users count, quizzes generated, and accuracy rate; student/teacher testimonials; pricing section (Free/Pro/Enterprise) with feature comparison; and a footer with navigation links. Fully responsive.

Create a Login page (/login) with an email/password form, a Google login button (UI only, no real auth), a 'Forgot password' link, and a clean card design. Create a Signup page (/signup) with animated role selection cards (Student / Teacher / Admin) with icons, name/email/password fields, a terms acceptance checkbox, and animated transitions between role selections.

Create a Student Dashboard (/dashboard) with: a welcome header showing user name and XP level; a 'Continue Last Quiz' card; a recent quizzes list with scores; an AI-recommended quizzes section; performance stats (streak, quizzes completed, accuracy, XP points); a leaderboard widget showing the top 5 users; a weekly performance line chart (Recharts); and quick action buttons. Populate with realistic mock data.

Create a Teacher/Admin Dashboard (/teacher-dashboard) with: stat overview cards (total students, quizzes created, avg score, completion rate); a Create Quiz quick action; a manage-quizzes table with edit/delete actions; a student performance overview; a bar chart for topic scores and a line chart for weekly activity (Recharts); a question bank summary panel; and a recent activity feed. Populate with realistic mock data.

Create an AI Quiz Generator page (/generate) with: a topic input field with suggestion chips; a difficulty selector (Easy/Medium/Hard/Expert) with visual indicators; question type checkboxes (MCQ, True/False, Fill in blanks, Coding questions); a number-of-questions slider (5–50); a language selection dropdown (10+ languages); an advanced options accordion containing a PDF upload button, a 'Generate from text' textarea, and a voice input button; a Generate button with a loading spinner animation; and a preview section that shows generated quiz questions with a gradient card design.

Create a Quiz Playing Interface (/quiz/:id) with: a distraction-free layout with a dark mode toggle; prominent question text; a countdown timer with circular SVG progress indicator that turns red when under 10 seconds; answer option cards with hover and selected states; a progress bar showing 'Question X of N'; Previous/Next navigation; a flag question button; a live score display; a power-ups bar (50/50, Skip, Extra Time) in Kahoot style; an adaptive difficulty indicator badge; and smooth CSS animations between questions. Use mock quiz data.

Create a Results Page (/results) with: a large animated score number and letter grade; a stats row (correct, incorrect, time taken, accuracy %); topic analysis breakdown with labeled progress bars; an AI feedback section with personalized text insights; a weak areas list with recommendations; a mini performance trend chart; recommended next quizzes cards; Share and Retake buttons; and a confetti animation that triggers for scores above 80%.

Create a Quiz Library page (/library) with: a search bar; a filter sidebar (Subject, Difficulty, Popularity, AI Recommended, Recently Added); a quiz cards grid showing title, topic, question count, star rating, play button, and difficulty badge; a featured quizzes carousel at the top; and category tabs. Populate with at least 10 mock quizzes.

Create a Leaderboard page (/leaderboard) with: a global ranking table (rank, avatar, name, XP, quizzes, accuracy); Friends and Weekly Challenge tabs; a top-3 podium display with gold/silver/bronze medals; the current user's own rank highlighted; and a weekly challenge countdown timer. Populate with at least 10 mock users.

Create an Achievements page (/achievements) with: a badges grid with earned (colored) and locked (greyed-out) states and descriptions; a streak tracker with a calendar heatmap visualization; a level progress bar showing XP to next level; and achievement categories (Learning, Streak, Social, Speed) as filter tabs. Populate with a mix of earned and locked mock achievements.

Create a Manual Quiz Creator page (/create-quiz) with a multi-step form flow: Step 1 – Quiz details (title, description, subject, difficulty); Step 2 – Add questions (question text, answer options, correct answer selector, question type selector, difficulty per question, drag handles for reordering, question bank search to add existing questions, Import CSV button); Step 3 – Review and Publish. Show a step indicator at the top.

Create a Question Bank page (/question-bank) with: a searchable, filterable table of questions (topic, difficulty, question type columns); filter controls for topic, difficulty, and question type; edit/delete/tag action buttons per row; bulk operation checkboxes with a bulk-action toolbar; an 'Add to Quiz' button per row; and a difficulty distribution donut/bar chart (Recharts). Populate with at least 20 mock questions.

Create an Analytics Dashboard page (/analytics) with: a date range picker; KPI cards (avg score, completion rate, total attempts, improvement rate); a line chart for performance over time; a bar chart for scores by topic/subject; a pie chart for question type distribution (all using Recharts); a student progress table; and an Export to CSV button. Populate with realistic mock data.

Create a Pricing Page (/pricing) with: three tier cards (Free, Pro at $9.99/mo, Enterprise with custom pricing); a full feature comparison table; a monthly/annual billing toggle showing 20% discount for annual; an FAQ accordion section; and CTA buttons on each plan. This page should be accessible without authentication.

Create a Profile Page (/profile) with: a user avatar with an upload button (UI only); an editable profile form (name, email, bio); a stats summary (quizzes taken, avg score, total XP); a recent activity feed; notification preference toggles; and account settings (change password link, delete account link).

Implement application-wide navigation: a persistent dark sidebar for authenticated pages with links to Dashboard, Generate Quiz, Quiz Library, Leaderboard, Achievements, Analytics, and Profile, each with a Lucide icon and label; role-based display (student vs teacher sidebar items); a top navbar with user avatar, notifications bell, and XP display; and a separate landing page header with Login/Signup CTA buttons. Include a hamburger menu for mobile viewports. Configure React Router to connect all 15+ page routes.

Apply a consistent design system across all pages: primary purple/violet gradient (#7C3AED to #4F46E5) with cyan/teal accents; cards with rounded-xl corners and subtle box shadows; smooth CSS transitions and micro-animations on interactive elements; loading skeleton states for data-heavy sections; and toast notification components for user actions. Ensure all pages are mobile-responsive.
